tgt_original: bhūyāt sthitirmama sadāsthirasā bhavanta-  mevaṃ mahāśayavaraṃ paramaṃ namāmi || 11 ||
kvedaṃ ca śaiśavaparaṃ nanu cārurupaṃ  saṃdarśanīyavarakomalabālacandram |
durvāramāramathanaṃ ca mayaikasahyaṃ  vikrāntaduḥsahaparaṃ kva ca ceṣṭitaṃ te || 14 ||
tvatkāntileśavimalā daśadikpratānaiḥ  pakṣāsitakṣayakṛśā sakalā suśobhā |  paryanta iṣṭaśaśino bhavaneṣu yatte
bandhurhi ko mārgikasaṃmataṃ mataṃ naro narī sā sa ca satpathaṃ patham |
